name: Open House Sundays
description: Come visit us every Sunday from noon - 2pm for our open house sessions where you can meet our artists in-person and enjoy a beverage and some light snacks.

name: Flash Fridays
description: Visit us anytime Friday and you can choose any black & gray flash art from our 'A' Wall and get it for only $100! That's right, any image that's under 5 inches with no modifications for this great price.

name: Kid's Tattoos!
description: All throughout this month, bring the kids with you to Bad Panda, and we'll get them inked up! Well ...not really, but we'll treat your kids to some fine temporary tattoos so that they won't feel left out!

name: Seattle Tattoo Museum
description: Visit our friends over at the Seattle Tattoo Museum and dive into the history of tattoos. This landmark site was established in 1941 and is open daily. Address: 1508 Boren Ave Seattle, WA 98101
